description.en: Course consists  of individual work  and seminars, where students read different performing arts texts, fills out personal reading diaries and take part in seminars.
description.et: Kursus toimub iseseisva töö ja seminaride vormis, mille raames üliõpilane loeb iseseisvalt etenduskunstide alaseid tekste ,täidab lugemispäevikut ja osaleb seminarides.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to give students an overview of the performing arts literature, to practice reading, reviewing and using performing arts litearature  in one's creative and academic work.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on omandada ülevaade  etenduskunstide erialakirjandusest, harjutada võõrkeelse erialase teksti lugemist, refereerimist, kasutamist loovuurimuses.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the successful completion of the course the student:
- has an overview of the performing arts literature available in the Library of UT VCA;
learning_outcomes.et: - omab ülevaadet erialakirjandusest TÜ VKA raamatukogus;

learning_outcomes.en: - has a command of foreign specific vocabulary;
- is able to make short summaries of  the texts.
